segments.text: Well , Betty . Since you ’ Ve done well during the probation period , we decided to employ you formally . And now we need to sign the formal agreement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much , Mr . Smith . I am very happy that I ’ ll be a member of your team . May I see the agreement first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . If you have any questions , just bring them out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , thank you . Well , I find that the salary level in this agreement is not like what you have said in the interview . Can you give me some explanations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it ’ s like this , during your first year , you will enjoy this salary level , a year later , we ’ ll increase your salary by 20 % .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we add up this item to the agreement ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , maybe the personnel department made some mistakes in making the agreement . Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . Shall we sign the agreement now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , welcome to our company . I hope we can cooperate happily .
segments.speaker: S1
